title: WTB/WTTF: T206 Rossman Miscuts (specifically the Rossman-Thomas)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: T206 Rossman Miscuts (specifically the Rossman-Thomas)
posts.post_content:
Now that I've been able to pick up the second Rossman-McBride, I'd REALLY like to find the Rossman-Thomas.  Also interested in any major/minor T206 Rossman miscuts to add to the collection.

Here's a scan of the Rossman-Thomas that I'm trying to find:
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=57085&stc=1&d=1329432356[/IMG]

I picked up the other known Rossman-McBride.  Looking for other Rossman miscuts.

Here's what I have:
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=89601&stc=1&d=1362004565[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=89603&stc=1&d=1362004596[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=89604&stc=1&d=1362004631[/IMG]
while I can't help you, Claude Rossman was one of the more interesting players in the T206 set, IMO.  Early victim of the yips.

I'd be willing to trade some of my miscuts for any Rossman miscuts... Still looking for the ever elusive Rossman-Thomas.

Figured that this was worth a bump after a few months... :rolleyes:
